entry.title: Game: Infinity Blade (iOS, 2010)
entry.content:
Last month there was a sale and I bought Infinity Blade for the iPhone. One of my favourite recent games was Shadow Complex for the Xbox from the same developer, so I was expecting Infinity Blade to be great. I'd heard it was a lot like Punch Out!!! for the NES, so I had high hopes.

I played it fairly regularly for a few weeks, but I haven't touched it in almost a month, so I probably won't play it again.

I found the game to be very rote. I could get through basically every battle with the same simple technique. Although there was the advancement system that made you do more damage, etc, I never felt very powerful because the enemies scaled as well.

I'm glad the game has been successful for Chair, but I really don't like it. It's too shallow for me and it is on a device I really dislike for games. I hope that Chair goes back to Shadow Complex, or similar games.
